document.query: CREATE TABLE `assign_shop` ( `id` bigint(20) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `client_id` bigint(20) NOT NULL, `shop_id` bigint(20) NOT NULL, `deleted` tinyint(1) NOT NULL, `assigned_at` datetime NOT NULL, `created_at` datetime NOT NULL, `updated_at` datetime NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=latin1
